Plot: Follows an elite hit man as he teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.
Title: The Mechanic
Writer: Richard Wenk (screenplay), Lewis John Carlino (screenplay), Lewis John Carlino (story)
Actors: Jason Statham, Ben Foster, Tony Goldwyn, Donald Sutherland
tomatoConsensus: Jason Statham and Ben Foster turn in enjoyable performances, but this superficial remake betrays them with mind-numbing violence and action thriller cliches.
